messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Mystery of the Vanishing Van DATE: 08/15/47 In the courtroom, the atmosphere was tense. As the trial of the century unfolded, the prosecutor called forth the officers involved in the investigation. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: PROSECUTOR: Please state your name and role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Captain A. B. Clark, the lead investigator in this case. PROSECUTOR: Thank you, Captain Clark. Now, could you please explain the process of how the van was discovered missing? WITNESS: Certainly. On the evening of July 7th, Officer C. D. Elton reported the van missing from the secure facility. We immediately launched an investigation. PROSECUTOR: Who was assigned to the forensics of the case? WITNESS: Sergeant E. F. Grant and Technician G. H. Hayes were in charge of the forensic analysis. PROSECUTOR: And the interrogations? WITNESS: Detectives I. J. King and L. M. Lee conducted the interrogations. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense then cross-examined Captain Clark on the steps taken to secure the facility and the subsequent investigation procedures. In the course of the trial, several other law enforcement personnel were called to testify including Patrol Officers N. O. Perry, P. Q. Quinn, and R. S. Reed.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
